description: This is an Angular component implementing a Q&A page. It manages the state and interactions for displaying questions, answers, and submitting new questions, including AI-generated answers.

classes.name: QnaComponent
classes.description: Angular component for Q&A page managing questions and answers.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Initializes the component by fetching questions.

methods.name: toggleSidebar
methods.description: Toggles the visibility of the sidebar.

methods.name: fetchQuestions
methods.description: Fetches the list of questions from the service.

methods.name: onSelect
methods.description: Handles selection of a question and loads its answers.

methods.name: loadAnswers
methods.description: Loads answers for the specific question ID.

methods.name: submitQuestion
methods.description: Submits a new question, generates an AI answer, and updates the UI accordingly.
